TopicTitle: CATCH THAT KERMAN! - A KSP-incarnation of an old fad

Articles.Content:
Anyone remember the old days of YouTube? Especially when the fad of 'CATCH THAT MAN!' came to be?

Here is my attempt at recreating the fad, albeit in Kerbal Space Program;

 

It's admittedly slow paced, especially since the Kerbals following suit aren't running, but eh, the EVA Follower mod is still fun.

 

Enjoy!

--Fred Cop--
